com.wsfmn.habit

Class HabitHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wsfmn.habit.HabitHistory

  • public class HabitHistory
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to store the HabitEvents of all Habits and the number of History refers to this list of all past HabitEvents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HabitHistory()
      Construct a new Habit History to store Habit Events.
